name: YehudaDevir
shippingDetails: Domestic handling time: Will usually ship within 3 business days of receiving cleared payment. Delivery time estimated: 20-30 business days. $6 Standard Shipping to worldwide except: Algeria, Bahrain, Kuwait, Lebanon, Libya, Council United Arab Emirates, Iran, Sudan, Syria, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Pakistan, Qatar, Yemen.
returnsPolicy: After receiving the item, contact seller within 15 days, money back, buyer pays return shipping. Guarantee: Get the item you ordered or get your money back.

shelves.name: "One of Those Days" VOL.1
shelves.description: "One of Those Days" Collection 1 The first collection book of the best illustrations from my comics "One of These Days". Based on real moments of everyday life with my wife, Maya. 2018 print | Limited edition English | 88 pages. Each book comes signed by the artist In a padded envelope.
